name: Bees Line Margosa Capsule
description: The Bees Line Margosa capsules are an active blood purifier including anti-viral and anti-bacterial properties. This amazing medicinal supplement can nourish the hair and skin, treat fever, cough and stomach complaints, maintain the health of your liver, kidneys and heart in the form of easy-to-use capsules. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
